title: PREFACE
content: The purpose of the author in writing this story is to furnish the public with reliable information about the Ku Klux Klan, and at the same time give entertainment. It is also hoped that Klansmen who read this story will be given a greater appreciation of the Invisible Empire. While this is essentially a work of fiction, yet the principles as here elucidated are the true principles of the Ku Klux Klan. Statistics quoted in this story are accurate and quotations credited to real persons are correct. The story as a whole is fiction but many of the incidents are true. George Alfred Brown. Neodesha, Kansas, August 14, 1923.
